item.title: BC-22 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on BC-22 South. Distance to USA Border - 1 km. Border crossing at Port of Frontier is open 24 hours.

item.title: BC-22 South/BC-3B West at BC-22/BC-3B Split
item.description: BC-22 South/BC-3B West at BC-22/BC-3B split. Turn right for BC-3B West to Grand Forks and Castlegar. Turn left for BC-22 South to Spokane USA.

item.title: BC-22 South/BC-3B West - Rossland
item.description: Rossland City Limit on BC-22 South/BC-3B West.

item.title: BC-22 South/BC-3B West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on BC-22 South/BC-3B West. Distance to Rossland, Grand Forks (via BC-3B), and Spokane (Washington, via BC-22).

item.title: BC-3B West at BC-22 - Trail
item.description: BC-3B West at BC-22 in Trail. Turn left for BC-3B West/BC-22 South. Continue straight for BC-22 North. BC-3B west joins BC-22 south to Rossland.

item.title: BC-3B West at BC-22 - Trail
item.description: BC-3B West at BC-22 in Trail. Use BC-22 north to Castlegar and Nelson. Use BC-22 South/BC-3B West to Warfield and Rossland.

item.title: BC-3B West Approaching BC-22
item.description: BC-3B West approaching BC-22 in Trail. Use BC-3B West/BC-22 South for Rossland and Spokane (Washington). Bridge in background of photo is the Columbia River bridge in Trail.

item.title: BC-22 South at BC-3B - Trail
item.description: BC-22 South at BC-3B in Trail. Turn right for BC-22 South/BC-3A West to Rossland/Warfield. Continue straight for BC-3B to BC-22A/BC-3/Trail City Centre/Salmo. BC-3B West joins BC-22A South to Rossland.

item.title: BC-22 South - Rivervale/Oasis Jct.
item.description: BC-22 South at Rivervale/Oasis Jct. Continue south on BC-22 for Trail.

item.title: BC-22 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on BC-22 south. Distance to Trail and Rossland.

item.title: BC-3 West - BC-22 Offramp at 6th Ave.
item.description: BC-3 West - BC-22 Offramp at 6th Ave. in Castlegar. Continue ahead for BC-22 south/Trail and Castlegar City Centre.

item.title: BC-3 West at BC-22 South Interchange
item.description: BC-3 West at BC-22 South/Trail interchange.

item.title: BC-3 West at BC-22 South - Castlegar
item.description: BC-3 West at BC-22 South in Castlegar. Use BC-22 south for Castlegar and Trail. Continue west on BC-3 for Castlegar City Centre and Grand Forks.
